note: Employee of Leiden University in the Netherlands, who not in a million years would let me speak on its behalf. Part Data Steward in the Faculty of Social & Behavioural Sciences (FSW). Part Senior Researcher at the Centre for Science & Technology Studies (CWTS). (Recovering) (auto)ethnographer of knowledge infrastructures. Lighthouse connoisseur. Avid tennis watcher. Accumulator of more LPs than I'll ever have the time to listen carefully to.

fields.name: What that really means
fields.value: I support researchers in their Research Data Management practices, and I also conduct research to understand how Research Data Management can be more meaningfully practiced and organized

fields.name: ORCID
fields.value: https://orcid.org/0000-0001-6137-4047
